summary: The module offers tools for assessing and using spoken language understanding models on the SLURP benchmark. It includes a component that gathers model predictions, updates evaluation metrics, and computes final scores, as well as a helper for parsing semantic annotations. Additionally, it provides functionality to load a pretrained SLU model, run inference on audio inputs to obtain intent and slot outputs, and optionally export the results for further analysis.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to efficiently evaluate and deploy speech intent‑slot models, streamlining performance measurement and inference pipelines for voice‑enabled applications.
